Name: Pain Split
Effect: Single Target. Spend 1 Will Point to activate. *Deal up to 3 Typeless Damage to the Target, Heal 1 HP to the User for every Damage dealt this way. This Move Fails if the User has more than Half HP rounded down. This Move cannot reduce a Target to less than 1 HP.
Description: The user channels their pain into the foe to relieve their agony. The foe gets to feel the burn of the damage it has caused.
